author: schone_wizard

author: lastmjs
content: Does anyone working on Ethereum 2.0 know why the Medalla testnet only has participation in the 70%s? I would love to see 90+%, why isn't happening after a few weeks now?

author: raulj
content: Hi <@!443823988561412097> at genesis, a lot of people likely stopped participating. After the bug occurred, even more dropped off. There will always be that deadweight until those validators get ejected. Participation has climbed recently because more active people are finally exiting the activation queue, however, there is no money involved

author: raulj
content: so no direct incentive for people to keep participating, especially if theyre paying money for a VPS

author: lastmjs
content: Do you ever expect Medalla to get to 90%+?

author: raulj
content: Once more validators become active, especially those aiming to treat it seriously, it should continue climbing. However, there is no real money involved

author: raulj
content: so as that happens, other people might drop-off

author: raulj
content: Not sure, it really depends on the people participating

author: lastmjs
content: Do you expect 90%+ participation on the live network?

author: raulj
content: Unless 10% are happy to be losing money 24/7, yes

author: raulj
content: no reason why it shouldnt be close to 100

author: lastmjs
content: Thanks for the explanations, I appreciate it
